meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>look up to</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to look up at</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to look up to</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Personally, I look up to the color <reading>青</reading> (あお). Literally and figuratively. I love the color blue, so I look up to it and respect it. Also, I look up at the sky and it's blue.
